Name: Hound
Description: Deal 1 damage to one or two enemies that have previously been dealt damage today.

Name: Hit Piece
Description:
Deal 1 damage to one or two enemies.
Discard the top card of the encounter deck.

Name: Twist the Story
Description:
Deal 1 damage to one enemy.
Rotate up to two hero cards on your field.

Name: Follow-Up
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If that enemy has previously been damaged today, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Sell Copies
Description:
Choose one:
• Deal 3 damage divided as you choose between one or more enemies.
• After you play another action today, reprint it and discard it.
